article_title: Employers Coaxing Retirees To Try Obamacare Exchanges

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As employers look at ways to reduce health expenses, some are considering giving retirees contributions and sending them to the public exchanges under the Affordable Care Act. A new survey of large employers by Aon Hewitt (AON) shows two-thirds of companies are considering changes to their “pre-65 retiree health strategies” and [...]
